name: Re-Roll
description:
Survive infinite waves of enemies. Every time you take damage you reroll your weapon.

Controls

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

Space - Sprint

Other

SFX - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...

MUSIC - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/8bit-music-062022-225623
